page.title: 19ST.THOMAS LEISURE CENTRE.
page.content: St. Thomas station is famous because it was designed by I.K.Brunel.They hope more trains will come to St.Thomas because they are building a new leisure centre.There is going to be a kidney shaped fun pool,with a wave machine and 2 water chutes,an artificial beach, gym,5 squash courts, 8 snooker tables,4 badminton courts,a bar,a restaurant & other amenities. There will also be a new library. When the new library is built a computer will issue the tickets,and we will not use our orange cards,but a plastic ticket to go in the computer. When they were digging the site they found an old bell foundry which made a bell for Bristol cathedral.The leisure centre is being built by Rush & Tomkin There is going to be a large Sainsbury & 2 small shops.
